Detailed Description

This class containt a list of pre-loaded file that can be used in content view obect.

This class is creating by a project. All file defined in the project is pre-loaded. Next when a content view object want to access to a file, he look to know if the file isn't already pre-loaded.

If the content of the file is found, he is returned ; else he is created. In this last case, we launch a thread to fill the content of the node.

The goal is to down the size in the memory, and speed up the loading of file and completion.

ContentViewNode * ContentViewCache::contentOfFileName ( const QString &  filename  ) 

Return the content view for the given file name. Look in the cache if the node exist. If not, use the XinxPluginLoader to create the content file name.

Parameters:
filename The file name of the content view to create.
Returns:
Return the content view of the file name given in parameters.
